DataElement.preferredName: Lesion Description Performed Observation Outcome Code Data Change Text ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A characterization of the extent of any localized or abnormal change in the structure of part of an organ or tissue. A character string that is a revision of the original text observation result to enable the coding of the text. EXAMPLE(S): If the original text is "hedache", the value code modified text could be changed to "headache", so that the text can be successfully encoded.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lesion Description Performed Observation Outcome Code Data Change Text
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
